tool_description: Converts patterns between different notation systems and formats used in knitting, crochet, and weaving patterns worldwide.

source_format.description: Original pattern format (US terminology, UK terminology, chart symbols, written instructions, German, Japanese)

target_format.description: Desired output format (US terminology, UK terminology, chart symbols, written instructions, German, Japanese)

error_messages: Unsupported format conversion: Use supported formats [US terminology, UK terminology, chart symbols, written instructions, German, Japanese].
Invalid craft type: Use one of [knitting, crochet, weaving].
Pattern text too long: Maximum 100 lines of instructions supported.
Empty pattern text: Provide at least one line of pattern instructions.
Incompatible format combination: Some format combinations may not be directly convertible.
usage: Specify source_format, target_format, craft_type, and provide pattern_text array with instructions to convert between notation systems.

conversion_notes.description: Important notes about the conversion process
